Headline: Heat Advisory issued July 17 at 2:38PM CDT until July 18 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS
Note: Alert for Kay (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service
Description:
...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM CDT
TUESDAY...
* WHAT...Heat index values 105 to 109 expected.
* WHERE...Kay County.
* WHEN...From noon to 8 PM CDT Tuesday.
* IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat
illnesses to occur.

Headline: Flood Warning issued July 16 at 7:51PM EDT until July 18 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS
Note: Alert for Hampden (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service
Description:
...The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton MA has issued a
Flood Warning for the following rivers in Massachusetts...
Connecticut...Rhode Island...
Connecticut River At Thompsonville affecting Hampden and Hartford
Counties.
Farmington River At Simsbury affecting Hartford County.
Wood River At Hope Valley affecting Washington County.
For the Connecticut River...including Montague
Instruction:
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the
dangers of flooding.
Turn around
